      • isDebugEnabled

        public static boolean isDebugEnabled(java.lang.Class<?> c)
        log4j for JavaSE, don't use it in Android app

        JavaSE上的log4j library專用之Method,Android上的Log不要使用此Method

        Parameters:
        c - The name of class will be used as the name of the logger to retrieve.
        Returns:
        log4j的debug level是否enable
